resources.string: Check that your Logitech device is set up properly and that both devices are on the same network.
This bookmark has been removed on Logitech Revue and is no longer available
Could not connect to Logitech Device
Another user has started a %1$s activity using a Harmony remote. System is currently starting the activity.
Another user has started a %1$s activity using a Harmony remote. The screen will now change to display %1$s activity controls.
Another user has turned the system off using a Harmony remote.
Another user has started a %1$s activity using a Harmony remote. System is currently starting the activity.
Another user has performed a sync which has turned off the current activity.
Could not connect to Harmony Link
If any devices did not start correctly tap here to manually turn them on
Turns off all the devices that were turned on
Do you want to power off the activity?

"For complete control of your entertainment system, go to "myharmony.com/apps" on your computer.
You will be able to add Activities like Play XBOX and Watch DVD.
When you are asked to sign in, use your Google account xyz@gmail.com"
Check that this phone is on the same network as your Logitech device
"Try entering your Revue's IP address manually:"
"(This can be found on your Revue in Settings>Network>Network Information)."
"If you continue to experience problems, please consult Logitech's"
No Watch TV activity set up for your Harmony Link.
To add more devices and activities, go to www.MyHarmony.com
Use the buttons below to navigate on your TV.
"Long-press an empty slot to add a new button. Drag-and-drop an existing button to move it."
IP Address for target Logitech Revue
Make sure your TV is on and connected to your Logitech Revue.
Enter the 4-digit passcode as it appears on your TV screen.
The passcode you entered did not match.
Tap Show Tips for tips on using gestures
You can use gestures like swipe and drag to control volume and playback.
Need additional assistance? Please review the options below.
If your Logitech Revue is available, you can use your Revue Controller to navigate the app below:
Help is available on the web:
For self-help articles, FAQs, and support contact information, tap the link belowhttp://www.logitech.com/en-ca/support-downloads/downloads/universal-remotes
"For self-help articles, FAQs, and support contact information, tap the link below. "Logitech support site
"For self-help articles, FAQs, and support contact information, tap the link below. "Logitech support site
Go to the website for the Harmony Link Customer Care support numbers
Browse through your Google TV bookmarks and other options to quickly access your content
Selecting an item on the screen will turn on the required devices and go to the content
If any devices did not start correctly, tap here to fix the problem

"You do not have any One Touch activities set up.
Activities allow you to turn on all the devices involved in a particular activity, turn off the ones you don't need, and change the necessary inputs, all with a single touch.
Go to MyHarmony.com to set up activities like Watch TV, Watch a Movie etc."
If you have made changes on My Harmony, tap Sync Now below to update your app.
Harmony Link needs to be updated to a newer version before you can sync. This can take a few minutes. Do you want to update now?
Unable to Sync. Please try again.
Sync in progress. Another user is currently syncing.
You may experience some connection loss between Harmony Link and Phone. Please wait until installation completes.
Your Harmony account password is changed. Please login again
Your Harmony account password was incorrect. Please try again.
Use the sliders below to change the sensitivity of the trackpad. Once your settings are correct, press \"Save Changes\".
Controls are not available because nothing appears to be on
Choose an item from the One Touch Screen and the appropriate controls will be available
A WiFi connection is required to use this application
Did everything turn off properly? If not, use the buttons below to power off your devices.
If any of the following devices are on please turn them off to test your Watch TV activity.
Please update your software on Logitech Revue if you would like to be able to use Harmony Remote.
Please update the Harmony Remote software with the latest version available on the Android Marketplace.
It is recommended that you update the Harmony Remote software with the latest version available on the Android Marketplace.

"You have some partially setup activities in your Harmony account.
Please go to myharmony.com to complete the setup of these activities."
"There are no activities configured. Please go to myharmony.com to configure activities."
"Command '%1$s' is not available. Please try again"
Nothing to synchronize. Please add a device and set up an activity, then synchronize.
Error: Unable to create primary controls
Select the activity you want to start when you tap on the favorite channel
No Matching Icons Found. Please refine the search text and try again, or use default icon
To tune to favorites, you need to set up a Watch TV activity. Please sign into MyHarmony.com on your computer to set up the activity.
No Service available. Please try again...
The Logitech Harmony app is not supported on your device
